channel.title: Some 3D Games by me
channel.description:
I had no clue mopar had a game dev section, but since r-s hates me for selling my veteran account, I might as well share with mopar :)
3 days in, and the basic prototype is completed for this small scale ghetto FPS. [img]http://i.troll.ws/5277d7aa.png[/img]
I don't know if I'll finish this or not, it's mostly just 3D/networking practice before I implement networking into my 3D MORPG project..
Here's my work in progress MORPG, in development for longer than I'd like to think about :D
"game play" screen shot [img]http://i.troll.ws/9e0983fb.png[/img]
Awesome low quality gif [img]http://i.imgur.com/q2jZ3cX.gif[/img]
